body:
Hi there, I really enjoy making channel art and I also put some of them on youtube, anyways, if you would like me to make something for you just check these things below:

Btw, im not the really worlds best at making this kinda stuff, but at least im a little bit experienced:

IGN:

What Do You Want Me To Make? (Banner, Profile Picture/Thumbnail):

Skype:

Cape? yes or no:

Favourite Colors:

Subscribe to my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ6MHwcb70gUz8EtWIB9xGg

What do you want the banner to look like? (What the character -s will do and the environment):

If you're not sure you can check out my previous ones here to have an eazier decision: http://imgur.com/a/apjs3
Thanks!

-Sam!

replies.body:
IGN: Raging

What Do You Want Me To Make? (Banner, Profile Picture/Thumbnail): Banner (And profile picture if possible)

Skype: Samiad456

Cape? yes or no: Yes pls

Favourite Colors: well my skin is like brown and green so something that matches my skin would be cool :)

What do you want the banner to look like? (What the character -s will do and the environment): Ok so i want myself Zeusy and Justbudah in it. Basically a girl minecraft person is walking one way and my head and budah's are looking at her and then a boy is walking the other way and zeus it him xd 

for the profile pic just a picture of my minecraft guy at a medium closeup shot (basically like upper chest and upwards) with a cool background like a gradient matching the colours of my skin 

You dont have to do this but if you are bored then a thumbnail saying 'Tournament Series' with 'Team Apollo' under it in bold writing with a background of one of the tournament maps would be sick 

 
Cheers!
